i know its not that deep and i know bi people can be gay!dean truthers but i still get this uncomfortable feeling like the fandom thinks being bi is not queer enough to be compelling, like dean still being attracted to women isnt as fun as dean just being a ladies man who's in fact secretly not really attracted to women and i KNOW its not like that for many people and im bringing in my own weird shit into it but dean being attracted to men in general IS queer enough; he IS overcompensating and he IS hiding a part of himself and that should be compelling enough without having to erase his attraction to women
